synopsis.text: Myne's life takes an unexpected turn when she becomes obsessed with creating new things, leaving her family and friends baffled. Little do they know, the real Myne has been replaced by Urano Motosu, a book-loving college student and aspiring librarian who tragically died in an earthquake. Now reincarnated in a world where books are scarce and only accessible to the elite, Myne is determined to bring her beloved books to the masses. With her memories from her previous life intact, Myne sets out on a mission to create and print her own books, no matter the cost. Follow Myne's journey as she navigates through a medieval society with low literacy rates and a strict class system, where the magic-wielding nobles rule supreme. Will Myne's passion for books be enough to overcome the challenges that lie ahead? Find out in this biblio-fantasy that will captivate book lovers and bookworms alike.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
